docblock.description: This class is an advanced autoloader for missing class references.
docblock.long-description: Able to register namespace specific paths, as well as prefix specific paths.

tag.name: author
tag.description: Steven Wilson

docblock.description: A bool that states whether the Autoloader is registered with spl_autoload
An array of registered paths
An array of registered namepace => path
An array of registered prefix => path
Registers the AutoLoader class with spl_autoload (Done automatically)
Registers a path for the autoload to search for classes.
docblock.long-description: Namespaced and prefixed registered paths will be searched first if the class is namespaced, or prefixed.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full path to search for a class

docblock.description: Registers a path for the autoloader to search in when searching for a specific namespaced class.
docblock.long-description: When calling this method more than once with the same namespace, the path(s) will just be added to the current ruuning list of paths for that namespace

tag.name: param
tag.description: The namespace we are registering

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full path, or an array of paths to search for the namespaced class'.

docblock.description: Registers a path for the autoload to search for when searching for a prefixed class.
docblock.long-description: When calling this method more than once with the same prefix, the path(s) will just be added to the current ruuning list of paths for that prefix

tag.name: param
tag.description: The class prefix we are registering

tag.name: param
tag.description: Full path, or an array of paths to search for the prefixed class'

docblock.description: Returns an array of all registered namespaces as keys, and an array of registered paths for that namespace as values
Returns an array of all registered prefixes as keys, and an array of registered paths for that prefix as values
Method used to search all registered paths for a missing class reference (used by the spl_autoload method)

tag.name: param
tag.description: The class being loaded

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns TRUE if the class is found, and file was included successfully.

docblock.description: Loads a view file for the child controller (See detailed description)
docblock.long-description: The first path searched is the current template's module/views folder. If the template does not contain a view for the current module, then the modules view folder will be checked... If a view file cannot be located on either of those paths, a ViewNotFoundException will be thrown unless the variable $silence is set to true, in which case a false will be retuned.

tag.description: The view filename to load (no extension)

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the views javascript file (located in the modules JS folder). Leave null for no file, or to use the default template's view js file.

tag.description: Returns false if the view file cannot be located, (and $silence is set to true), a Library\View object otherwise

tag.description: The name of the views javascript file (located in the modules JS folder). Leave null for no file, or to use the default template's view js file.

docblock.description: When called, if the user is not logged in, the login screen will be shown.

docblock.description: When called, if the user does not have the specified permission, a 403 "forbidden" screen will be displayed, or a redirection will occur (depending on vars).

tag.description: The redirect URI (or url). If set to false, a 403 "forbidden" screen will be displayed instead of a redirect.
